segments.text: One Grand Slam breakfast for you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . You know , I just noticed that these eggs are fried , and I ordered scrambled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for pointing that out . I mistakenly gave you your friend's breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem . I can just trade my plate with his .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A special order of banana pancakes for you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pancakes ? I don't like pancakes . I ordered waffles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can eat my bacon and eggs while you are exchanging my pancakes for waffles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go trade those pancakes for waffles right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would take care of it , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
